mapper.select: SELECT b.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rn, a.* FROM (SELECT pdt.pdt_id, pdt.cat_id, pdt.subcat_id, pdt.brd_id, pdt.gender_id, pdt.pdt_nm, pdt.pdt_price, pdt.pdt_img, pdt.pdt_views, brd.brd_nm FROM product pdt left outer join brand brd on pdt.brd_id = brd.brd_id ORDER BY pdt.pdt_id desc) a WHERE ROWNUM <= ${page} * 9) b WHERE b.rn > (${page} - 1) * 9
select * from product order by pdt_views desc
mapper.insert: insert into product (pdt_id, cat_id, subcat_id, pdt_nm, pdt_price, brd_id, gender_id, pdt_img) values(pdt_id_seq.nextval, #{catId}, #{subcatId}, #{pdtNm}, #{pdtPrice}, #{brdId}, #{genderId}, #{pdtImg})
mapper.update: update product set pdt_nm=#{pdtNm}, pdt_price=#{pdtPrice}, pdt_img=#{pdtImg} where pdt_id=#{pdtId}
mapper.select: SELECT pdt.pdt_id, pdt.cat_id, pdt.subcat_id, pdt.brd_id, pdt.gender_id, pdt.pdt_nm, pdt.pdt_price, pdt.pdt_img, pdt.pdt_views, brd.brd_nm, cat.cat_nm, subcat.subcat_nm, gender.gender_nm FROM product pdt left outer join brand brd on pdt.brd_id = brd.brd_id left outer join categories cat on pdt.cat_id = cat.cat_id left outer join sub_category subcat on pdt.subcat_id = subcat.subcat_id left outer join gender on pdt.gender_id = gender.gender_id where pdt.pdt_id=#{pdtId}
mapper.update: update product set pdt_views=pdt_views+1 where pdt_id=#{pdtId}
mapper.select: select count(*) from product where cat_id=#{catId}
